ObjectClass.Name: Factory
ObjectClass.Description:
FACTORY:
Basic vehicle production building
Regenerates HP and LC

Objective.Name: Build Lancer Micro-Fighter
Objective.Details: Multi-role light fighter-bomber \Attacks ground and air targets \Produces Caltrop Mines

Objective.Name: Build AutoMech
Objective.Details: Durable AA support walker \Strong against airborne enemies \Inaccurate vs moving ground targets \Detects cloaked units \Machinery-Tech increases durability

Objective.Name: Build Marauder A.T.F.V.
Objective.Details: Agile cloaking all-terrain light tank \Decloaks to fight; Can't hit flying targets \Specials-Tech enables Combat Overcharge \Invisible in Fog of War

Objective.Name: Build Housecarl M.F.V.
Objective.Details: Fast and heavily armored CQB tank \Strong vs ground and air \Can produce and carry infantry \Upgradeable to to VARANGIAN H.F.V.

Objective.Name: Build Housecarl M.F.V.
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires Machinery-Tech upgrade\ at the FACTORY

Objective.Name: Build Tornade Fighter-Bomber
Objective.Details: High impact strike fighter-bomber \Agile and durable multi-role aircraft \Devastating vs undefended ground targets \Detects cloaked units

Objective.Name: Build Tornade Fighter-Bomber
Objective.Details: Not Available \ Requires Machinery-Tech upgrade\ at the FACTORY

Objective.Name: Upgrade Machinery-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable constructing heavy vehicles \Enhance AutoMech damage endurance \Unlock Macrofab Aerospace-Tech upgrade

Objective.Name: Upgrade Ground-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable refit: AutoTurret->Sensor Turret \Enable refit: Housecarl MFV->Varangian HFV \Extend Marauder ATFV Overcharge \Double Caltrop Mine ammo efficiency

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable Marauder ATFV Overcharge ability \Enable Assault-Marine combat cloak \Enable Saber Frigate special attack

ObjectClass.Name: Machinery-Tech Center
ObjectClass.Description:
Machinery-Tech:
This Factory is now a dedicated Tech support building
Visible to all factions through Fog of War

Objective.Name: Upgrade Machinery-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable constructing heavy vehicles \Increase AutoMech combat resilience \Unlock Aerospace-Tech Macrofab upgrade

Objective.Name: Upgrade Ground-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable AutoTurret refit to Sensor Turret \Enable Housecarl MFV refit to Varangian HFV \Increase Marauder ATFV Overcharge duration \Increase Caltrop Mine cloaked lifespan

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable Marauder ATFV Overcharge ability \Enable Assault-Marine emergency cloak \Enable Tornade and Saber burst-fire attacks

ObjectClass.Name: Ground-Tech Center
ObjectClass.Description:
Ground-Tech:
This Factory is now a dedicated Tech support building
Visible to all factions through Fog of War

Objective.Name: Upgrade Machinery-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable constructing heavy vehicles \Increase AutoMech combat resilience \Unlock Aerospace-Tech Macrofab upgrade

Objective.Name: Upgrade Ground-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable AutoTurret refit to Sensor Turret \Enable Housecarl MFV refit to Varangian HFV \Increase Marauder ATFV Overcharge duration \Increase Caltrop Mine cloaked lifespan

Objective.Name: Upgrade Specials-Tech
Objective.Details: \Enable Marauder ATFV Overcharge ability \Enable Assault-Marine emergency cloak \Enable Tornade and Saber burst-fire attacks

ObjectClass.Name: Specials-Tech Center
ObjectClass.Description:
Specials-Tech:
This Factory is now a dedicated Tech support building
Visible to all factions through Fog of War

ObjectClass.Name: Factory (Wreckage)
ObjectClass.Description:
This Factory is destroyed
No risk from further internal explosions
